title: Authors and Citation
text: Ros G, Verweij S (2023). BBWPC: Calculator BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP). https://github.com/AgroCares/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator, https://agrocares.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {BBWPC: Calculator for BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP)},   author = {Gerard Ros and Sven Verweij},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/AgroCares/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator, https://agrocares.github.io/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator/}, }

title: Calculator for BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP)
text: bedrijfsbodembaterplan_rgb BBWPC R package can used calculate opportunities suitability agronomic measures using individual field properties. calculating engine BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP). BBWP tool used farmers advisors Netherlands recommend field specific agronomic measures focusing improvement soil health, reduction nutrient losses groundwater surface water water retention. Learn BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan bedrijfsbodemwaterplan.nl.

title: Calculator for BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP)
text: BBWPC can installed GitHub using remotes. install current development version master branch. Stable versions can found releases.
code: remotes::install_github("AgroCares/BedrijfsBodemWaterPlanCalculator") library("BBWPC")

title: Calculator for BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP)
text: Documentation R functions BBWPC package can found Logo NMI

title: BBWPC: Calculator for BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP) — BBWPC-package
text: BBWP Calculator can used calculate opportunities suitability agronomic measures improve sustainability agriculture. includes framework BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP) developed Netherlands (Ros et al., 2020), well Dutch Ecoregelingen Framework developed Boerennatuur associated agricultural farmers collectives. come together BBWP tool support farmers soil water management. BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan tool Netherlands recommends field specific agronomic measures focusing improvement soil health, reduction nutrient losses groundwater surface water water retention properties. information BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan can found www.bedrijfsbodemwaterplan.nl.

title: BBWPC: Calculator for BedrijfsBodemWaterPlan (BBWP) — BBWPC-package
text: Maintainer: Gerard Ros gerard.ros@nmi-agro.nl Authors: Sven Verweij sven.verweij@nmi-agro.nl contributors: Job de Pater job.depater@nmi-agro.nl [contributor] Yuki Fujita yuki.fujita@nmi-agro.nl [contributor] Kees van den Dool kees.vandendool@nmi-agro.nl [contributor] Astrid Berndsen astrid.berndsen@nmi-agro.nl [contributor] Brent Riechelman brent.riechelman@nmi-agro.nl (ORCID) [contributor] Nutriënten Managment Instituut nmi@nmi-agro.nl [copyright holder]

what: Calculate the BBWP scores on field and farm level — bbwp
title: Calculate the BBWP scores on field and farm level — bbwp
text: Estimate potential contribute agronomic environmental challenges region farm assess impact farm measures taken. high BBWP score indicative number opportunities improve soil quality land use.

title: Calculate the BBWP scores on field and farm level — bbwp
code: bbwp(   B_SOILTYPE_AGR,   B_LU_BBWP,   B_GWL_CLASS,   B_SC_WENR,   B_HELP_WENR,   B_SLOPE = NULL,   B_SLOPE_DEGREE = NULL,   B_AER_CBS,   A_CLAY_MI,   A_SAND_MI,   A_SILT_MI,   A_SOM_LOI,   A_N_RT,   A_FE_OX,   A_AL_OX,   A_P_CC,   A_P_AL,   A_P_WA,   A_P_SG,   B_GWP,   B_AREA_DROUGHT,   B_CT_PSW,   B_CT_NSW,   B_CT_PSW_MAX = 0.5,   B_CT_NSW_MAX = 5,   D_SA_W,   D_RO_R,   B_AREA,   M_DRAIN,   LSW,   a_lat = NULL,   a_lon = NULL,   measures,   sector,   output = "scores" )

title: Calculate the BBWP scores on field and farm level — bbwp
text: B_SOILTYPE_AGR (character) type soil, using agronomic classification B_LU_BBWP (character) BBWP category used allocation measures BBWP crop categories B_GWL_CLASS (character) groundwater table class B_SC_WENR (character) risk subsoil compaction derived risk assessment study Van den Akker (2006) B_HELP_WENR (character) soil type abbreviation, derived 1:50.000 soil map B_SLOPE (boolean) DEPRECATED, use B_SLOPE_DEGREE instead. slope field, steeper 3%? B_SLOPE_DEGREE (numeric) slope field (degrees) B_AER_CBS (character) agricultural economic region Netherlands (CBS, 2016) A_CLAY_MI (numeric) clay content soil (%) A_SAND_MI (numeric) sand content soil (%) A_SILT_MI (numeric) silt content soil (%) A_SOM_LOI (numeric) organic matter content soil (%) A_N_RT (numeric) organic nitrogen content soil (mg N / kg) A_FE_OX (numeric) aluminium content soil (mmol / kg) A_AL_OX (numeric) iron content soil (mmol / kg) A_P_CC (numeric) plant available P content, measured via 0.01M CaCl2 extraction (mg / kg) A_P_AL (numeric) plant extractable P content, measured via ammonium lactate extraction (mg / kg) A_P_WA (numeric) P-content soil extracted water (mg P2O5 / L) A_P_SG (numeric) P-saturation index (%) B_GWP (boolean) field located groundwater protected area (options: TRUE FALSE) B_AREA_DROUGHT (boolean) field located area high risks water deficiencies (options: TRUE FALSE) B_CT_PSW (numeric) critical target required reduction P loss agriculture (kg P / ha) reach targets KRW B_CT_NSW (numeric) critical target required reduction N loss agriculture (kg N / ha) reach targets KRW B_CT_PSW_MAX (numeric) max critical target P reduction loss (kg P / ha) B_CT_NSW_MAX (numeric) max critical target N reduction loss (kg N / ha) D_SA_W (numeric) wet perimeter index field, fraction field surrounded water D_RO_R (numeric) risk surface water runs parcel B_AREA (numeric) area field (m2) M_DRAIN (boolean) tube drainage present field LSW (data.table) data.table LSW properties including oow_id. See details. a_lat (numeric) Latitude field (required LSW submitted) a_lon (numeric) Longitude field (required LSW submitted) measures (data.table) measures planned / done per fields sector (string) vector farm type given agricultural sector (options: options: 'dairy', 'arable', 'tree_nursery', 'bulbs') output (string) vector specifying output type function. Options: scores, measures

title: Calculate the BBWP scores on field and farm level — bbwp
text: B_SLOPE_DEGREE used, backwards compatibility B_SLOPE can still used. least one must used, supplied, B_SLOPE ignored. LSW default data.table LSW properties.Sending oow_id sufficient retrieve LSW properties BBWP internal package table. needed, one can also send sf object retrieve LSW properties.

title: Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators for all fields in the Netherlands — bbwp_farm_score
text: S_BBWP_TOT (numeric) score integrative opportunity index (risk times impact) field S_BBWP_NGW (numeric) scoring index lowering N emission ground water (risk times impact) field S_BBWP_NSW (numeric) scoring index lowering N emission surface water (risk times impact) field S_BBWP_PSW (numeric) scoring index lowering P emission surface water (risk times impact) field S_BBWP_NUE (numeric) scoring index use N P inputs efficiently field S_BBWP_WB (numeric) scoring index buffer store water efficiently use water plant growth field B_AREA (numeric) area field (m2)

what: Calculate five risk or opportunity indicators for an agricultural field — bbwp_field_indicators
title: Calculate five risk or opportunity indicators for an agricultural field — bbwp_field_indicators
text: include indicators:  limited efficiency nitrogen phosphorus; high risk also indicative high potential improve NUE. potential buffer store water efficiently use water plant growth. risk nitrogen phosphorus leaching runoff surface water. risk nitrate leaching groundwater.

title: Calculate five risk or opportunity indicators for an agricultural field — bbwp_field_indicators
code: bbwp_field_indicators(   D_NGW_SCR,   D_NGW_LEA,   D_NGW_NLV,   D_NSW_SCR,   D_NSW_GWT,   D_NSW_RO,   D_NSW_SLOPE,   D_NSW_WS,   D_NSW_NLV,   D_PSW_SCR,   D_PSW_GWT,   D_PSW_RO,   D_PSW_SLOPE,   D_PSW_WS,   D_PSW_PCC,   D_PSW_PSG,   D_PSW_PRET,   D_NUE_WRI,   D_NUE_PBI,   D_NUE_WDRI,   D_NUE_NLV,   D_WUE_WWRI,   D_WUE_WDRI,   D_WUE_WHC )

title: Calculate five risk or opportunity indicators for an agricultural field — bbwp_field_indicators
text: D_NGW_SCR (numeric) relative score soil compaction risk N loss groundwater D_NGW_LEA (numeric) relative score nitrate leaching risk N loss groundwater D_NGW_NLV (numeric) relative score N mineralization N loss groundwater D_NSW_SCR (numeric) relative score soil compaction risk N loss surface water D_NSW_GWT (numeric) relative score soil wetness N loss surface water D_NSW_RO (numeric) relative score runoff risks N loss surface water D_NSW_SLOPE (numeric) relative score runoff risks N loss surface water given slope D_NSW_WS (numeric) relative score wet surrounding N loss surface water D_NSW_NLV (numeric) relative score N mineralization N loss surface water D_PSW_SCR (numeric) relative score soil compaction risk P loss surface water D_PSW_GWT (numeric) relative score soil wetness P loss surface water D_PSW_RO (numeric) relative score runoff risks P loss surface water D_PSW_SLOPE (numeric) relative score runoff risks P loss surface water given slope D_PSW_WS (numeric) relative score wet surrounding P loss surface water D_PSW_PCC (numeric) relative score P levels soil solution P loss surface water D_PSW_PSG (numeric) relative score P saturation degree P loss surface water D_PSW_PRET (numeric) relative score P retention capacity P loss surface water D_NUE_WRI (numeric) relative score soil water stress improved efficiency N P inputs D_NUE_PBI (numeric) relative score P availability improved efficiency N P inputs D_NUE_WDRI (numeric) relative score drought stress improved efficiency N P inputs D_NUE_NLV (numeric) relative score N mineralization improved efficiency N P inputs D_WUE_WWRI (numeric) relative score soil wetness stress improved efficiency water D_WUE_WDRI (numeric) relative score drought stress improved efficiency water D_WUE_WHC (numeric) relative score drought stress improved efficiency water

title: Calculate the relative impact of field properties given its position in the landscape — bbwp_field_properties
text: B_SOILTYPE_AGR (character) type soil, using agronomic classification B_LU_BBWP (character) BBWP category used allocation measures BBWP crop categories B_GWL_CLASS (character) groundwater table class B_SC_WENR (character) risk subsoil compaction derived risk assessment study Van den Akker (2006) B_HELP_WENR (character) soil type abbreviation, derived 1:50.000 soil map B_SLOPE_DEGREE (numeric) slope field (degrees) B_AER_CBS (character) agricultural economic region Netherlands (CBS, 2016) A_CLAY_MI (numeric) clay content soil (%) A_SAND_MI (numeric) sand content soil (%) A_SILT_MI (numeric) silt content soil (%) A_SOM_LOI (numeric) organic matter content soil (%) A_N_RT (numeric) organic nitrogen content soil (mg N / kg) A_FE_OX (numeric) aluminium content soil (mmol+ / kg) A_AL_OX (numeric) iron content soil (mmol+ / kg) A_P_CC (numeric) plant available P content, measured via 0.01M CaCl2 extraction (mg / kg) A_P_AL (numeric) plant extractable P content, measured via ammonium lactate extraction (mg / kg) A_P_WA (numeric) P-content soil extracted water (mg P2O5 / L) A_P_SG (numeric) P-saturation index (%) D_SA_W (numeric) wet perimeter index field, fraction field surrounded water D_RO_R (numeric) risk surface water runs parcel LSW (data.table) surface water polygon catchment polder (NULL available, lat/lon provided) a_lat (numeric) Latitude field (required LSW submitted) a_lon (numeric) Longitude field (required LSW submitted)

title: Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators for all fields in the Netherlands — bbwp_field_scores
text: B_SOILTYPE_AGR (character) type soil B_GWL_CLASS (character) groundwater table class A_P_SG (numeric) B_SLOPE_DEGREE (numeric) slope field (degrees) B_LU_BBWP (character) BBWP category used allocation measures BBWP crop categories B_AER_CBS (character) agricultural economic region Netherlands (CBS, 2016) M_DRAIN (boolean) tube drainage present field D_SA_W (numeric) wet perimeter index field, fraction field surrounded water D_RISK_NGW (numeric) risk nitrate leaching groundwater given field properties D_RISK_NSW (numeric) risk nitrate leaching runoff surface water given field properties D_RISK_PSW (numeric) risk phosphorus leaching runoff surface water given field properties D_RISK_NUE (numeric) efficiency nitrogen phosphorus fertilizer use given field properties D_RISK_WB (numeric) potential buffer store water efficiently use water plant growth given field properties B_GWP (boolean) field located groundwater protected area (options: TRUE FALSE) B_AREA_DROUGHT (boolean) field located area high risks water deficiencies (options: TRUE FALSE) B_CT_PSW (numeric) critical target required reduction P loss agriculture (kg P / ha) reach targets KRW B_CT_NSW (numeric) critical target required reduction N loss agriculture (kg N / ha) reach targets KRW B_CT_PSW_MAX (numeric) max critical target P reduction loss (kg P / ha) B_CT_NSW_MAX (numeric) max critical target N reduction loss (kg N / ha) measures (data.table) measures planned / done per fields sector (string) vector farm type given agricultural sector (options: 'dairy', 'arable', 'tree_nursery', 'bulbs')

text: Estimate score agronomic measures improve soil water management agricultural farms.  send ordered list back suitable measures.

title: Rank the suitability of agronomic measures to improve soil and water management for a given field — bbwp_meas_rank
code: bbwp_meas_rank(   B_SOILTYPE_AGR,   B_GWL_CLASS,   A_P_SG,   B_SLOPE_DEGREE,   B_LU_BBWP,   B_AER_CBS,   M_DRAIN,   D_SA_W,   S_BBWP_NGW,   S_BBWP_NSW,   S_BBWP_PSW,   S_BBWP_NUE,   S_BBWP_WB,   measures,   sector )

title: Rank the suitability of agronomic measures to improve soil and water management for a given field — bbwp_meas_rank
text: B_SOILTYPE_AGR (character) type soil B_GWL_CLASS (character) groundwater table class A_P_SG (numeric) B_SLOPE_DEGREE (numeric) slope field (degrees) B_LU_BBWP (character) BBWP category used allocation measures BBWP crop categories B_AER_CBS (character) agricultural economic region Netherlands (CBS, 2016) M_DRAIN (boolean) tube drainage present field D_SA_W (numeric) wet perimeter index field, fraction field surrounded water S_BBWP_NGW (numeric) BBWP score nitrate leaching groundwater given field properties (0-100, 100 equals targets met) S_BBWP_NSW (numeric) BBWP score nitrate leaching runoff surface water given field properties (0-100, 100 equals targets met) S_BBWP_PSW (numeric) BBWP score phosphorus leaching runoff surface water given field properties (0-100, 100 equals targets met) S_BBWP_NUE (numeric) BBWP score potential improvement efficiency nitrogen phosphorus fertilizer use given field properties (0-100, 100 equals targets met) S_BBWP_WB (numeric) BBWP score potential improvement potential buffer store water efficiently use water plant growth given field properties (0-100, 100 equals targets met) measures (data.table) table properties available measures sector (string) vector farm type given agricultural sector (options: 'diary', 'arable', 'tree_nursery', 'bulbs')

what: Agronomic measures that can be applied — bbwp_measures
title: Agronomic measures that can be applied — bbwp_measures
text: table contains series agronomic measures, applicability effectiveness multiple ecosystem services

title: Agronomic measures that can be applied — bbwp_measures
code: bbwp_measures

title: Agronomic measures that can be applied — bbwp_measures
text: data.table 157 rows 70 columns: bbwp_id unique BBWP measure id based van Gerven number measure, related study Van Gerven et al. (2020) nr_mok mock code bbwp measure id boot22_id measure id refering measure code Dutch "BOOT-lijst 2022" eco_id unique Ecoregeling measure id summary short explanation measure description elaborate description measure url URL refers web resource containing fact sheet specific measure level spatial scale measure valid: "field" "farm" category measure category, choices: "teeltmaatregel", "bodemverbetering", "bedrijf", "slootkantbeheer", "gewasbescherming", "precisiebemesting", "niet_productief", "watervasthouden" "erf" dairy Applicability measure dairy sector arable Applicability measure arable sector vegetables_outdoor Applicability measure (outdoor) vegetables sector bulbs Applicability measure bulb sector tree_nursery Applicability measure tree nurseries sand Applicability measure sandy soils loess Applicability measure loess soils clay Applicability measure clay soils peat Applicability measure peat soils psw_psg_low Additional impact effectiveness measure P losses surface water P saturation index low psw_psg_medium Additional impact effectiveness measure P losses surface water P saturation index medium psw_psg_high Additional impact effectiveness measure P losses surface water P saturation index high nsw_drains Additional impact effectiveness measure N losses surface water fields drainage nsw_nodrains Additional impact effectiveness measure N losses surface water fields without drainage nsw_gwl_high Additional impact effectiveness measure N losses surface water high groundwater level conditions nsw_gwl_low Additional impact effectiveness measure N losses surface water low groundwater level conditions psw_noslope Additional impact effectiveness measure P losses surface water slope psw_bulbs Additional impact effectiveness measure P losses surface water applied bulb field ngw_grassland Additional impact effectiveness measure N losses groundwater grasslands p_ow Effectiveness measure total P load surface water p_ow2 Effectiveness measure P concentration ditch n_ow Effectiveness measure total N load surface water n_ow2 Effectiveness measure N concentration ditch effect_ngw Effectiveness measure nitrate losses groundwater effect_psw Effectiveness measure P losses surface water effect_nsw Effectiveness measure N losses surface water effect_nue Effectiveness measure improving nutrient use efficiency effect_wb Effectiveness measure improve water holding capacity soil effect_costs Index representing costs implementing measure b_lu_arable_er Boolean indicating whether crop falls within ER category "arable" b_lu_productive_er Boolean indicating whether crop falls within ER category "productive" b_lu_cultivated_er Boolean indicating whether crop falls within ER category "cultivated" er_climate measure impact score eco theme climate er_soil measure impact score eco theme soil er_water measure impact score eco theme water er_landscape measure impact score eco theme landscape er_biodiversity measure impact score eco theme biodiversity er_euro_ha estimated costs measure per hectare (euro/ha) er_euro_farm estimated costs measures per farm (euro/farm) bbwp_conflict Code indicating measure conflict: measures bbwp_conflict code conflicting acc_anlb Indicator specifying score reward need adjust measure already applied Dutch ANLB, choices: "none", "score ", "reward ", "score reward" acc_glmc Indicator specifying score reward need adjust measure already applied Dutch GLMC, choices: "none", "score ", "reward ", "score reward" regio_factor Boolean specifying whether regional correction measure costs based agricultural economic region required bodemkwaliteit Boolean specifying whether measure greatly contributes eco theme soil waterkwaliteit Boolean specifying whether measure greatly contributes eco theme water klimaat Boolean specifying whether measure greatly contributes eco theme climate biodiversiteit Boolean specifying whether measure greatly contributes eco theme biodiversity landschap Boolean specifying whether measure greatly contributes eco theme landscape nc1 Applicability measure crop category "gras_permanent" nc2 Applicability measure crop category "gras_tijdelijk" nc3 Applicability measure crop category "rustgewas" nc4 Applicability measure crop category "rooivrucht" nc5 Applicability measure crop category "groenten" nc6 Applicability measure crop category "bollensierteelt" nc7 Applicability measure crop category "boomfruitteelt" nc8 Applicability measure crop category "natuur" nc9 Applicability measure crop category "mais" nc10 Applicability measure crop category "randensloot" nc11 Applicability measure crop category "vanggewas" nc12 Applicability measure crop category "eiwitgewas" categories Eco /BBWP categories measure greatly contributes

what: A table with the BBWP parameters — bbwp_parms

title: A table with the BBWP parameters — bbwp_parms
code: bbwp_parms

title: A table with the BBWP parameters — bbwp_parms
text: object class data.table (inherits data.frame) 26 rows 14 columns.

title: A table with the BBWP parameters — bbwp_parms
text: code parameter code parameter Brief description parameter unit unit parameter applicable product Data classifier, = Soil measurements, B = Environmental characteristics,   D = Soil feed characteristics derived soil/feed measurements,   M = Soil management measures, S = Scores, RM = Recommendations (measures/gifts),   = Indicators, F = Feed measurements, P = soil amendment product element Indicates chemical element parameter name method1 Method used determine value method2 Additional details method data_type Type data parameter pertains : numeric, integer, char, bool, geom, enum value_min Lowest possible value parameter may numeric integer value_max Highest possible value parameter may numeric integer explanation additional explanation enum boolean whether parameter values drawn limited set options Allowed values parameter type enum seperated "||" choices Vectorized version options

what: Calculate the chance that soil property is lower than the measured value given the variation in a catchment — cdf_rank
title: Calculate the chance that soil property is lower than the measured value given the variation in a catchment — cdf_rank
text: assuming normal distributed density function. chance can used relative ranking position field given variation inside catchment.

title: Calculate the chance that soil property is lower than the measured value given the variation in a catchment — cdf_rank
code: cdf_rank(smean, ssd, svalue)

title: Calculate the chance that soil property is lower than the measured value given the variation in a catchment — cdf_rank
text: smean (numeric) mean value numeric soil property given catchment ssd (numeric) variation (standard deviation) among numeric soil property given catchment svalue (numeric) measured value soil property field inside catchment

what: Calculate the Ecoregeling scores on field and farm level — ecoregeling
title: Calculate the Ecoregeling scores on field and farm level — ecoregeling
text: Estimate potential contribute agronomic environmental challenges region farm assess impact farm measures taken. high Ecoregeling score indicative number opportunities improve soil quality, water quality, climate biodiversity landscape.

title: Calculate the Ecoregeling scores on field and farm level — ecoregeling
code: ecoregeling(   B_SOILTYPE_AGR,   B_LU_BRP,   B_LU_BBWP,   B_GWL_CLASS,   B_SLOPE_DEGREE,   B_AER_CBS,   B_LU_ARABLE_ER,   B_LU_PRODUCTIVE_ER,   B_LU_CULTIVATED_ER,   A_P_SG,   D_SA_W,   B_AREA,   M_DRAIN,   farmscore,   measures,   sector,   output = "scores",   medalscore = "gold",   pdf = FALSE )

title: Calculate the Ecoregeling scores on field and farm level — ecoregeling
text: B_SOILTYPE_AGR (character) type soil B_LU_BRP (numeric) crop code (gewascode) BRP B_LU_BBWP (character) BBWP category used allocation measures BBWP crop categories B_GWL_CLASS (character) groundwater table class B_SLOPE_DEGREE (numeric) slope field (degrees) B_AER_CBS (character) agricultural economic region Netherlands (CBS, 2016) B_LU_ARABLE_ER (boolean) crop fall within ER category "arable" B_LU_PRODUCTIVE_ER (boolean) crop fall within ER category "productive" B_LU_CULTIVATED_ER (boolean) crop fall within ER category "cultivated" A_P_SG (numeric) P-saturation index (%) D_SA_W (numeric) wet perimeter index field, fraction field surrounded water B_AREA (numeric) area field (m2) M_DRAIN (boolean) tube drainage present field farmscore (numeric) desired total ER score farm level measures (data.table) measures planned / done per fields sector (string) vector farm type given agricultural sector (options: options: 'diary', 'arable', 'tree_nursery', 'bulbs') output (string) vector specifying output type function. Options: scores, measures medalscore (character) desired medal score expressed bronze, silver gold pdf (boolean) add table summary measures taken pdf. Options: TRUE FALSE

title: BBWPC v0.10.3

title: BBWPC v0.10.2

text: argument thresholds er_farm_aim medals s_er_tot field output aim total farm score costs threshold medals

title: BBWPC v0.10.2
text: maximum costs set 250 changed order output ecoregeling er_main update tests

title: BBWPC v0.10.1
text: reward now corresponding medal fixed value bronze, silver gold minor error test data test-er

title: BBWPC v0.10.1
text: visible binding s_er_reward added er_main

title: BBWPC v0.10.1
text: field score set equal farm score Ecoregeling method input arguments B_CT_?? removed er_crop_rotation,er_field_score input argument E_ER_TOT removed er_farm_score adjust targets landscape final scoring er_medal er_opi; minimum needed. indicator score set contribution single fields farm score. function er_field_score givers therefore actual score per hectare, relative score given target. measures table updated (levels (field vs farm) altered)

title: BBWPC v0.10.0
text: test csv files removed package directory dev directory threshold scores medals set zero indicators climate water (peat soils) absolute total score used medal check instead integrative total score “terras” measures recommended fields B_SLOPE_DEGREE less 2% (fix bbwp_meas_rank)

title: BBWPC v0.10.0
text: function er_opi estimate contribution single fields farm score exception measure G20 added er_meas_rank, er_meas_score er_crop_rotation.

title: BBWPC v0.10.0
text: field score set equal farm score Ecoregeling method input arguments B_CT_?? removed er_crop_rotation,er_field_score input argument E_ER_TOT removed er_farm_score adjust targets landscape final scoring er_medal er_opi; minimum needed. indicator score set contribution single fields farm score. function er_field_score givers therefore actual score per hectare, relative score given target. measures table updated (levels (field vs farm) altered)
